name: Ricoh Company, Ltd.
description: Ricoh Company, Ltd. is a global leader in office solutions and digital services, dedicated to transforming the way people work. Founded in 1936 in Tokyo, Japan, Ricoh has evolved from a manufacturer of cameras to a major provider of printing, imaging, and document management solutions. The company is renowned for its innovative multifunction printers, digital production printers, and IT services that enhance productivity and efficiency in the workplace. Ricoh’s mission is to support sustainable business practices by providing environmentally friendly products and solutions. The company's portfolio includes advanced technologies such as cloud services, software solutions for document workflow, and managed print services. In recent years, Ricoh has also focused on integrating AI and IoT technologies into its offerings to create smart workplaces that improve collaboration and streamline operations. With a commitment to corporate social responsibility, Ricoh aims to achieve a sustainable society by reducing its environmental impact and supporting communities worldwide.
